Our story, our value

Blancboard was formed in 2012 when it became clear that cloud computing and mobility would forever change the way we do business. Out of all the possible directions to pursue, we decided to focus on helping people deliver high impact presentations, in person and online.

Whether consciously or subconsciously, regardless of the age or location, often many times a day, we must all present our arguments, share our knowledge, convince, and negotiate.

The mobile devices that we carry in our pockets offer stunning touch-sensitive displays, always-on network connectivity, and all the computing power we need to become better presenters, teachers, sales people, and negotiators.

The effect becomes transformative if we connect the devices in a network and use them to instantly share content and collaborate. MightyMeeting offers a unique collection of innovative applications and services that make this possible.
